name: Electric_Current_Level_One
description: When an enemy fighter passes through the specified location, it generates a difference of electrical potential, creating an electric current that lasts for 5 seconds. Once activated, it deals 2 units of damage per second and prevents the enemy fighter(s) from moving.

name: Hacking
description: By altering the composition of the robot's core systems, converts the next “DR” enemy fighter which activates the trap into an ally.
